com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue.scan

Interface ScanMetrics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardScanMetrics

    public interface ScanMetrics
    Counters associated with a ScanJob.

    Conceptually, this interface contains two separate stores of counters:

    • the standard store, accessed via get and increment
    • the custom store, accessed via methods with custom in their names
    All counters values automatically start at zero.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ScanMetrics.Metric
      An enum of standard counters.

      Like incrementCustom(String, long), except the delta is 1.

      Increment a custom counter by delta.

    • Method Detail

      • getCustom

        long getCustom(String metric)
        Get the value of a custom counter. Only the effects of prior calls to incrementCustom(String) and incrementCustom(String, long) should be observable through this method, never the effects of prior calls to increment(com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue.scan.ScanMetrics.Metric).
        Parameters:
        metric -
        Returns:

      • incrementCustom

        void incrementCustom(String metric,
                     long delta)
        Increment a custom counter by delta. The effects of calls to method should only be observable through getCustom(String), never through get(com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue.scan.ScanMetrics.Metric).
        Parameters:
        metric - the name of the counter
        delta - the amount to add to the counter

      • incrementCustom

        void incrementCustom(String metric)
        Like incrementCustom(String, long), except the delta is 1.
        Parameters:
        metric - the name of the counter to increment by 1

      • get

        long get(ScanMetrics.Metric metric)
        Get the value of a standard counter.
        Parameters:
        metric - the standard counter whose value should be returned
        Returns:
        the value of the standard counter

      • increment

        void increment(ScanMetrics.Metric metric)
        Increment a standard counter by 1.
        Parameters:
        metric - the standard counter whose value will be increased by 1
